mapper.select: select t.work_no, t.valid_code, t.cond_type, t.item_code, t.attr_uuid, t.work_type_code, t.valid_start_dtm, t.valid_end_dtm, t.upd_user_dept_name, t.attr_val_upd_user, t.rgst_user, t.rgst_dtm, t.upd_user, t.upd_dtm from tb_cust_valid_attr_h t where t.valid_code = #{validCode} and t.attr_uuid = #{attrUuid} order by t.work_no desc
